description: Returns information about an Amazon Lex bot alias. For more information about aliases, see  versioning-aliases. This operation requires permissions for the lex:GetBotAlias action.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the bot alias. The name is case sensitive.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the bot alias.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: A description of the bot alias.

nested_items.name: botVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the bot that the alias points to.

nested_items.name: botName
nested_items.description: The name of the bot that the alias points to.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedDate
nested_items.description: The date that the bot alias was updated. When you create a resource, the creation date and the last updated date are the same.

nested_items.name: createdDate
nested_items.description: The date that the bot alias was created.

nested_items.name: conversationLogs
nested_items.description: The settings that determine how Amazon Lex uses conversation logs for the alias.

nested_items.name: logSettings
nested_items.description: The settings for your conversation logs. You can log text, audio, or both.

nested_items.name: logType
nested_items.description: The type of logging that is enabled.

nested_items.name: destination
nested_items.description: The destination where logs are delivered.

nested_items.name: kmsKeyArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the key used to encrypt audio logs in an S3 bucket.

nested_items.name: resourceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the CloudWatch Logs log group or S3 bucket where the logs are delivered.

nested_items.name: resourcePrefix
nested_items.description: The resource prefix is the first part of the S3 object key within the S3 bucket that you specified to contain audio logs. For CloudWatch Logs it is the prefix of the log stream name within the log group that you specified.

nested_items.name: iamRoleArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role used to write your logs to CloudWatch Logs or an S3 bucket.
